Widget build(BuildContext context) => FPicker(
  children: [
    if (builder)
      FPickerWheel.builder(builder: (context, index) => Text('$index'))
    else
      FPickerWheel(
        loop: loop,
        children: const [
          Text('January'),
          Text('February'),
          Text('March'),
          Text('April'),
          Text('May'),
          Text('June'),
          Text('July'),
          Text('August'),
          Text('September'),
          Text('October'),
          Text('November'),
          Text('December'),
        ],
      ),
  ],
);
